Name: Trend Micro Vision One
Author: Trend Micro
Description: The [Trend Micro Vision One](https://www.trendmicro.com/en_us/business/products/detection-response/xdr.html) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest security alerts and detection data reported in the Trend Micro Vision One platform into Microsoft Sentinel.
Analytic Rules: Analytic Rules/Create Incident for XDR Alerts
